page.title: 14HUNTINGDON SCHOOL BURGLED.
page.content: One night in June Huntingdon County Junior school was burgled.The intruders smashed a re_inforced glass window with a piece of wood.They entered the hall and broke into the stockroom.Fortunately little was taken.They entered the entrance hall which has an alarm system.On that day it wasn't working.The Heads and Deputy Head's offices were entered and cupboards were emptied with books,paper and pens scattered.Little of value was taken.They found a crowbar in the caretakers office and broke down another door. The computer and other electronical equipment were in this room.The school BBC computer was stolen along with a cassette recorder.Once again mess was left along the corridor.Equipment worth Â£1000 was taken.Nothing has been found.
